reviews.text: We booked 2 rooms for just one night since we need to depart very early on the highway bus from the Shinjuku Bus Terminal. Kubo San, the proprietor was very kind in assisting to make the highway bus ticket reservation for us. It was a pity that we didn't manage to meet face to face to thank him properly.
reviews.title: Good Value For Centralised Area

reviews.text: The minshuku was in an excellent location. Barely 5 minutes walk from the South Exit of the Shinjuku JR Station. Previous review mentioned that the lane was very dark at night. We 4 ladies or even 2 at times didn't feel insecure at all walking back at night.
reviews.title: Disappointing. Good location but overpriced

reviews.text: We left our luggage prior to check-in since we got to the minshuku before their check-in time. By the time we returned the luggage were all in our rooms. The rooms were cosy and comfortable. Windows could be opened wide. Good to have attached bathroom and toilet. However, no shampoo provided...
reviews.title: Best budget Ryokan in Tokio

reviews.text: Previous reviews mentioned free wifi in public area but was informed otherwise at check-in.
reviews.title: cosy lil' ryokan right at the heart of Tokyo city
